name: Stick Bold Ultimate Warrior
description:
Pick your star and escape the trap before it's too late!
Stick Bold : Super Ultimate Warrior is best game fighting adventure.
FUN and challenges through tons of levels. An awesome game for ALL AGES!

- FLY and DASH with amazing power-ups
- DODGE and JUMP all obstacles
- Collect star to BOOST
- EASY CONTROLS, just tap and shoot tap
- Cool adventure for all ages (yes! everybody!)
